info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 26 at 12:27PM MDT until June 27 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 108 expected. For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 111 expected. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the Excessive Heat Warning, from Noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat events.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
